INITIALIZE.TITLE: Let us get started
INITIALIZE.DESC: To create a bot, simply provide us with a URL. We will use both the URL and any available links within it to generate responses and train the bot. In the next step, you will be asked to select the links you want us to learn from.

SELECT_LINKS.TITLE: Select the links below
SELECT_LINKS.DESC: Select the relevant links from the list below. We will use these selected links to train the bot. The better the links you select, the better the bot's responses will be.

SELECT_INBOX.TITLE: Select the inbox
SELECT_INBOX.DESC: Choose the inbox where you want to deploy this bot. Your customers will be greeted by the bot initially and will be able to ask questions and converse with it. If the bot is unable to provide an answer, it will intelligently transfer the conversation to you.
